Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    ratpack.service.LegacyServiceAdapter
    since 1.3
    ratpack.server.Service
    since 1.3
    ratpack.server.StartEvent
    since 1.3
    ratpack.server.StopEvent
    since 1.3
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    ratpack.server.PublicAddress.builder(Context)
    since 1.2, use PublicAddress.builder()
    ratpack.http.client.RequestSpec.connectTimeoutSeconds(int)
    since 1.4, use RequestSpec.connectTimeout(Duration)
    ratpack.server.PublicAddress.get(Context)
    since 1.2
    ratpack.server.PublicAddress.get(Context, Action<? super HttpUrlBuilder>)
    since 1.2, use PublicAddress.get(Action)
    ratpack.server.PublicAddress.get(Context, String)
    since 1.2, use PublicAddress.get(String)
    ratpack.server.ServerConfig.getSslContext()
    since 1.5, prefer ServerConfig.getNettySslContext()
    ratpack.http.client.RequestSpec.getUrl()
    since 1.4, use RequestSpec.getUri()
    ratpack.http.client.HttpClient.httpClient(ByteBufAllocator, int)
    since 1.4, use HttpClient.of(Action)
    ratpack.http.client.HttpClient.httpClient(ServerConfig, Registry)
    since 1.4, use HttpClient.of(Action)
    ratpack.server.ServerConfig.isRequireClientSslAuth()
    since 1.5, replaced by ServerConfig.getNettySslContext()
    ratpack.bytebuf.ByteBufRef.order()
    ratpack.bytebuf.ByteBufRef.order(ByteOrder)
    ratpack.http.client.RequestSpec.readTimeoutSeconds(int)
    since 1.4, use RequestSpec.readTimeout(Duration)
    ratpack.handling.Redirector.redirect(Context, String, int)
    use Redirector.redirect(Context, int, Object)
    ratpack.server.ServerConfigBuilder.requireClientSslAuth(boolean)
    since 1.5, prefer ServerConfigBuilder.ssl(SslContext)
    ratpack.sse.ServerSentEventStreamClient.sseStreamClient(ByteBufAllocator)
    since 1.4, use ServerSentEventStreamClient.of(HttpClient).
    ratpack.server.ServerConfigBuilder.ssl(SSLContext)
    since 1.5, replaced by ServerConfigBuilder.ssl(SslContext)
    ratpack.http.client.RequestSpec.sslContext(Factory<SSLContext>)
    since 1.5, no replacement.
    ratpack.http.client.RequestSpec.sslContext(SSLContext)
    since 1.5, use RequestSpec.sslContext(SslContext)
